definition: located near the base of the neck, suggestive of a thyroid disorder
details:
noun
- located near the base of the neck
= synonyms: thyroid gland
adjective
- suggestive of a thyroid disorder
= example: suggestive of a thyroid disorder
- of or relating to the thyroid gland
= example: of or relating to the thyroid gland
= synonyms: thyroidal
